mapper.select: SELECT tgva.id, tgva.assignment_date, tgva.destination, tgva.total_people, tgva.adult_count, tgva.child_count, tgva.contact_phone, tgva.contact_person, tgva.pickup_method, tgva.pickup_location, tgva.dropoff_location, tgva.remarks, tgva.next_destination, tgva.status, tgva.booking_ids, tgva.tour_schedule_order_ids, tgva.passenger_details, tgva.special_requirements, tgva.dietary_restrictions, tgva.luggage_info, tgva.emergency_contact, tgva.language_preference, tgva.created_time, tgva.updated_time, tgva.guide_id, tgva.guide_name, g.phone as guide_phone, g.email as guide_email, g.languages as guide_languages, g.experience_years as guide_experience, tgva.vehicle_id, tgva.license_plate, tgva.vehicle_type, v.seat_count, v.location as vehicle_location, v.notes as vehicle_notes FROM tour_guide_vehicle_assignment tgva LEFT JOIN guides g ON tgva.guide_id = g.guide_id LEFT JOIN vehicles v ON tgva.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id WHERE tgva.id = #{id}
